title: I just bought a Pixel 3a about a week ago and it stopped working after a plane flight.
content:
My phone will not turn on and the screen is always black.

I have tried:
 1) Charging the phone with the provided charger for an hour
 2) Holding the power button - after 1-2 seconds, I get a haptic feedback vibration. There's no effect from holding the button longer up to a minute.
 3) Holding the power button and volume down - no effect
 4) Connecting the phone to a PC - the PC sees that a Pixel 3a device is connected
 5) Calling the phone after attempting to turn it on - it does not ring

Is this a hardware failure? Is there a process for me to get a replacement while I'm travelling?
